Nthati Moshesh (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A họpụtara ya dịka Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Supporting Role n'afọ 2016.
N'ikwu okwu na ENCA na ihe nkiri na telivishọn ọ na-ahọrọ, ọ kọwara na ọ naghị akatọ ihe a na-eji na telivshọn eme ihe, ọ bụrụhaala na a na-agafe ozi ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro ihe nkiri Soldier Soldier na Home Affairs na obere usoro ihe nkiri TV Human Cargo

Otú ọ dị, o kwuru na ihe nkiri na-achọwanye mgbagwoju anya, ọ na-ahọrọkwa teknụzụ ndị na-abịa na ya. N'afọ 2014, a kọrọ na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ncha Saint na Sinners, nke na-egosi na Mzansi Magic. N'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ayanda, nke meghere 36th Durban International Film Festival. O nwetakwara nhọpụta mbụ ya na AMAA kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ. N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nrite na 2016 South African Film and Television Awards.
N'otu edemede sitere n'ọnwa April afọ 2019, ọ na-ekwu maka ọgụ ya n'afọ gara aga na-adịghị arụ ọrụ ọnwa asatọ mana ugbu a ọ laghachiri na ihuenyo dịka onye isi nzuzo na-enweghị isi, Masabatha, na ihe nkiri ụlọ mkpọrọ, Lockdown.

Mgbe ọnwụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya, Mary Makgatho, ọ kwetara mmetụta nke onye na na-emeeme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. A kọrọ na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Performing Arts site na Technikon Natal.
